articles.title: 'Right to repair' movement growing in Australia, as Apple and others design products with shorter lifespans - ABC News
articles.description: A movement of people who want the 'right to repair' their own technology is growing in Australia, but we are playing catch-up on the global stage.
articles.content:
In 2021, almost everything we use is smart. From phones to fridges, coffee machines to tractors.
It has made life more efficient and convenient but when those products break, it's another story.
